alert.note: Alert for Eastern Ascension; Southern Livingston; St. James; St. John The Baptist (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 20 at 10:46PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern St. John The Baptist, east central Ascension, northeastern St. James and southeastern Livingston Parishes through 1115 PM CDT... At 1045 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Whitehall, or 15 miles north of Reserve, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Reserve, Laplace, Garyville, Whitehall, Edgard, Wallace and Killian. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 196 and 209. Interstate 55 in Louisiana between mile markers 1 and 6. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for southeastern Louisiana.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Ascension; Southern Livingston; St. James; St. John The Baptist
